title: Substitute
text: Substitute the x and y values of the ordered pair into the equation.

title: Simplify
text: Simplify each side such that their is a single number on both sides of the equation.

title: Interpret
text: If both sides of the equation equal each other, the ordered pair is a solution. Is the ordered pair a solution in this case?

title: Answer
text: Therefore, the ordered pair is a solution.
